articles.title: AI is helping astronomers make new discoveries and learn about the universe faster than ever before - EastMojo
articles.description: AI has spread into every field of astronomy. As the technology has become more powerful, AI algorithms have begun helping astronomers tame massive data sets and discover new knowledge about the universe.
